code_value: Questions 1~2  You are going fishing with your father this Sunday. Ask your father two questions about fishing.</br>Questions 3~4  One of your classmates who is good at skating promised to teach you how to skate this summer vacation. Ask your classmate two questions.
Questions 1~2  You are going fishing with your father this Sunday. Ask your father two questions about fishing.
Questions 3~4  One of your classmates who is good at skating promised to teach you how to skate this summer vacation. Ask your classmate two questions.
